text: Iray <rfy <TTHRf xifearu RM9 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (ev Iar a {zApf HcT4) Wav Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) v-5 & 6, 7zr-10 , aRGT , #frri-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No. 11041/217/2007-Admn Dated: 18.09.2014 Policy Matters: Administration/Finance(146/2014) (Decision taken on File No. NHALTech/TN/SP/FFF/2011) Sub: Expeditious implementation of Negotiated Settlements approved by Executive Committee/NHAI Board-Reg: Guidelines for one time Settlement of Disputes have been issued whereby the initial negotiations are carried out by a Committee of 3 CGMs and then matter is placed before the Independent Settlement Advisory Committee (ISAC) for its recommendation before seeking final approval of the Executive Committee/NHAI Board, 2_ It has been noted that the Technical Divisions are not prompt in implementing the approved settlements. The settlement is again processed on file for approval of the Chairman/ Member for approval of the settlement agreement and  authorizing the concerned GM for signing of settlement agreement; 3 It has been decided that the concerned CGM is empowered to implement the settlement as approved by the Board/Executive Committee: The CGMs will take all necessary actions for signing the settlement agreement and making payments to the contractor and withdrawal of respective court cases/on-going Arbitration process_ should mark a copy of the orders issued in all cases to the Member concerned. 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: (V.KSharma) Chief General Manager (LA & Coord:) To; All officers and employees of HQROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices H1 R1 ?7 HI NHAL They
